scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production node scripts/css.js && NODE_ENV=production node scripts/js.js && NODE_ENV=production node scripts/manifest.js && NODE_ENV=production npx tsx ./node_modules/.bin/eleventy --config=eleventy.config.ts
scripts.dev: node scripts/css.js && concurrently "node scripts/js.js watch" "NODE_ENV=development npx tsx ./node_modules/.bin/eleventy --config=eleventy.config.ts --serve --incremental"
